description: Arjun Narasingha KC (born 27 September 1947) is a Nepali politician and former Professor, currently serving as a Member of Parliament (MP) from Nuwakot representing the Nepali Congress Party. He has held several ministerial portfolios, including Education, Health, Housing & Physical Planning, and Urban Development. KC, a senior leader in the Nepali Congress, has been elected to the national parliament four times and has also served as the party's Joint General Secretary and spokesperson.
short_description: Nepali politician, former Professor, and former minister, currently serving as a Member of Parliament representing the Nepali Congress Party.
